stage.name: Brainstorm
stage.description: determine scope and purpose of the project

stage.name: Refine
stage.description: determine a path for implementing the project

stage.name: Alpha
stage.description: create a working prototype that can be criticized and changed

stage.name: Beta
stage.description: create a working product that can be refined and stablized

stage.name: Stable
stage.description: finalize and distribute the working product
